title: Values
summary: What does the company stand for, what are their goal? What other problems do they support? How is their appearance look and feel?
before: We need to have very basic Idea about the project, having discussion with the client and knowing them would be helpful.
after: You can align with the client, in terms of ethics, motives, and  overall vibe.

key_steps.text: Discuss with your client which of the next keywords represents them, it is a easy way for the client to communicate their core values better!

Authoritative Caring Cheerful Coarse Conservative Conversational Casual Dry Edgy Enthusiastic Formal Frank Friendly Fun Funny Humorous Informative Irreverent Matter-of-fact Nostalgic Passionate Playful Professional Provocative Quirky Respectful Romantic Sarcastic Serious Smart Snarky Sympathetic Trendy Trustworthy Unapologetic Upbeat Witty
List all of them down and group similar keywords together, and write a heading for each group
